# FastAnalytics S.A.S.

> FastAnalytics builds mathematical models and AI solutions for predictive decisions, specializing in spatiotemporal intelligence for citizen security, education, health, and transportation.

## Company Info
- Name: FastAnalytics S.A.S.
- Website: https://fastanalytics.co
- Email: hola@fastanalytics.co
- Location: Colombia
- Founded: 2024
- Tagline: IA espaciotemporal para decisiones predictivas (Spatiotemporal AI for predictive decisions)

## Founder
- Name: Andrés Pérez Coronado
- Role: Founder & CEO
- Education: PhD in Mathematical Engineering (EAFIT University, 2025), Humphrey Fellow (University of Minnesota), Fulbright Scholar
- Experience: 20+ years in citizen security analytics, led teams of 80+ analysts
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/andres-perez-coronado
- Academia: https://independent.academia.edu/AndrésPérezCoronado

## Services
1. Spatiotemporal Modeling (ML/AI) — Predictive models crossing geography and time
2. AI Agents for Decision-Making — Real-time data analysis assistants
3. Data Collection (bots, surveys) — Massive surveys via bots, fast and frictionless
4. Security & Coexistence Consulting — 20+ years of field experience in public safety
5. Dashboards / Data Visualization — Actionable data dashboards
6. Data Training & Education — Hands-on data training for teams
7. Research & Publications — Applied research that becomes public policy
8. Chatbot Development — Bots for Telegram, WhatsApp, and more

## Products
- AlejoSeguro (https://t.me/AlejoSeguro_bot) — Telegram bot collecting citizen security perceptions in Bogotá
- Ceci Teaches (https://t.me/Ceci_Teaches_bot) — AI-powered educational chatbot on Telegram
- VIGÍA — Real-time crime pattern anticipation system (in development)

## Publications
- Research Profile: https://independent.academia.edu/AndrésPérezCoronado (7+ academic papers)
- Book: "Policía para el Desarrollo Humano" (Grupo Editorial Ibáñez, 2021)
- Book Chapter: "Analítica de datos para la seguridad ciudadana" (Editorial Logos, 2024)

## Markets
- Citizen Security & Coexistence
- Education
- Health
- Transportation
- Private Enterprise
